decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:
PL-DR-00-00, PL-DR-EX-00-01, PL-DR-EX-01-02, PL-DR-EX-02-03, PL-DR-EX-RL-04, PL-DR-EX-XX-50, PL-DR-EX-XX-51, PL-DR-PR-00-11, PL-DR-PR-01-12, PL-DR-PR-02-13 Rev: 1, PL-DR-PR-RL-14 Rev: 1, PL-DR-PR-XX-60 Rev: 1, PL-DR-PR-XX-61 Rev: 1, PL-DR-PR-XX-75, Reasonable Exemption Statement.    
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - The external surfaces of the roof lights hereby approved shall be in accordance with the details provided within the submitted application form.
REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the host building, locality and the Roxborough Park and the Grove Conservation Area in accordance with Core Policies CS1.B and CS1.D of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policies DM1 and DM7 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the drawings hereby approved, the new roof lights shall sit flush with their respective roof planes and shall be retained in that form thereafter. 
REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the host building, locality and the Roxborough Park and the Grove Conservation Area in accordance with Core Policies CS1.B and CS1.D of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policies DM1 and DM7 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Conversion of roofspace into habitable room; installation of one rooflight in side roofslope, two rooflights in rear roofslope
